description: build: keep environment variable changes local during Windows build

messages.text:

> 
> Probably run.bat should open with a setlocal too.

Like that http://codereview.appspot.com/5672061/ ?

Alex

> LGTM
> 

Thank you Brad. But I will Russ before I submit.
These changes, we need as much brain power as we can gather :-)

Alex

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5673048/diff/4001/src/make.bat
File src/make.bat (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5673048/diff/4001/src/make.bat#newcode9
src/make.bat:9: if x%2==x--no-local goto nolocal
hah. :)

Looks fantastic.  We'll get the hang of this 1970s batch file thing yet.

Probably run.bat should open with a setlocal too.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
